definition: to lean against/to rely on/on the basis of/no matter (how, what etc)/proof
certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]

pinyin: Mei3 guo2 Cun2 tuo1 Ping2 zheng4

sentences.english: You must satisfy the required conditions to get your voucher.
sentences.chinese: 必须具备所需条件方可获发凭证。

sentences.english: For selectivity, there should be evidence that the substance being quantified is the intended analyte.
sentences.chinese: 对选择性，应有凭证证明经定量的物质是目标分析物。

sentences.english: Instead, that money should be used to fund more Section 8 housing vouchers.
sentences.chinese: 相反，这些钱应该用来资助更多的第8项住房凭证。

sentences.english: And You Can Even Get Shopping Bags And Original Receipts If You Want.
sentences.chinese: 你甚至可以得到购物袋，以及原始凭证，如果你想。

sentences.english: Based on its authenticity and aboriginality, archives can be used for the voucher with force.
sentences.chinese: 档案在法律上的凭证作用基于它的原始性和真实性。

sentences.english: In my public houses by lease documents, note that a mezzanine floor.
sentences.chinese: 在我的公房租赁凭证上，注记有个阁楼。

sentences.english: The agreement between the manufacturers should be documented in a written contract.
sentences.chinese: 制造商间的协议应以书面合同的形式作为凭证。

sentences.english: Residents remitting outward funds to redeem his global depository receipts.
sentences.chinese: 居民为赎回其海外存托凭证所汇出之资金。

sentences.english: Voucher auditor signs on the correct payment request.
sentences.chinese: 凭证复核员在请款单上签字确认。

sentences.english: You can also pay by cash, you will get a receipt from us.
sentences.chinese: 您还可以当面付款，本所给您开据收据作为凭证。

sentences.english: Otherwise, take a minute to create your credentials now.
sentences.chinese: 否则，现在就花一分钟创建您的凭证。

sentences.english: These snapshots contain network configuration and credentials information.
sentences.chinese: 这些快照包含网络配置和凭证信息。

sentences.english: The Bryophyta specimens are preserved in the Bilogical Speciimen Mujseum of Henan Normal University.
sentences.chinese: 凭证标本存于河南师范大学标本馆植物标本室。

sentences.english: Visible Certificates are registered and the holders of these can report any loss directly to the bank.
sentences.chinese: 凭证式国债是记名式的，持有人可以直接向银行挂失。

sentences.english: The practice of education voucher in Changxing country makes us joyful and hopeful.
sentences.chinese: 长兴县的教育凭证制度的实践给予了我们欣喜和希望。

sentences.english: Ensure acing vouchers are well kept and properly filed for easy retrieval.
sentences.chinese: 确保财务凭证的良好保存及方便查询。

definition: receipt (written acknowledgement of receipt of an item)
